app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/1422-0067/22/3/1399/s1, Supplementary table S1: Networking analysis outcome of DEGs in cluster 2 of myxoid liposarcoma cells, Supplementary table S2: A comparative analysis of DIscBIO against similar scRNAseq pipelines, Supplementary table S3: A side-by-side evaluation of the performance of DiscBIO and Granatum using the CTC dataset, Supplementary Data S1: a list of 164 genes that are known to cause Golgi fragmentation, Supplementary Data S2: GEDs in CTC dataset.
